mapper.insert: insert /** AdmPjtPfx.insert */ into ADM_PJT_PFX(PJT_ID, PFX_NM, PFX_COLR_NM, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt) values (#{pjtId}, #{pfxNm}, #{pfxColrNm}, #{createUser}, sysdate, #{updateUser}, sysdate)
mapper.delete: delete /** AdmPjtPfx.delete */ ADM_PJT_PFX where 1 = 1 and PJT_ID = #{pjtId}
